channel.title: How do I change/edit these two things
channel.description:
How can I change these few things...-
The emote list (Where it says Dance, Wave, Spin, ect) - How do I change them? I can't seem to find it in the client.java so Im guessing it's something else.
Not bothered if you can explain with a tutorial link, or tell me what file it is to change them. Just please tell me which file holds the config for the emotes, so I can make my own & change the ones I already have.
And Is it possible to change the map? Or edit it. If yeh, how?
Thanks

item.title: How do I change/edit these two things
item.dc:creator: @AndyJay123 AndyJay123
item.description:
@AndyJay123 wrote:

Ta…

[quote=“judgechaos, post:8, topic:197593”]woopee another kiddie coder…first of all open up ur client.java then search for sumthing like this

Blow", 11102); thats were u change the color and name here is my list from my server…

sendQuest("@gre@Safe, @red@Wild, @whi@Emote", 174); sendQuest("@gre@Drag", 180); sendQuest("@gre@Abby", 181); sendQuest("@gre@Barr", 178); sendQuest("@gre@Slayer", 175); sendQuest("@gre@PVP", 177); sendQuest("@gre@Shop", 182); sendQuest("@red@KBD", 185); sendQuest("@red@Chaos", 186); sendQuest("@gre@Jad", 173); sendQuest("@gre@JDem", 179); sendQuest("@gre@TS", 187); sendQuest("@gre@Gaurd", 176); sendQuest("@gre@BlueD", 13371); sendQuest("@gre@BM", 13372); sendQuest("@gre@Elf", 13373); sendQuest("@gre@Tz -", 13374); sendQuest("@gre@Haar", 13375); sendQuest("@gre@PGD", 13376); sendQuest("@gre@", 13377); sendQuest("@gre@Fish", 13378); sendQuest("@gre@", 13379); sendQuest("@gre@Dag", 13380); sendQuest("@red@Moss", 13381); sendQuest("@gre@KQ", 13382); sendQuest("@whi@Blow", 11102); sendQuest("@whi@Kiss", 11103); sendQuest("@whi@Glass", 6533); sendQuest("@whi@Box", 6532); sendQuest("@whi@Climb", 6540); sendQuest("@whi@Rope", 6541); sendQuest("@whi@Lean", 11101); sendQuest("@whi@Glass", 6519); sendQuest("@whi@Wall", 6522);

if u wanna change it to a tele search this…

case 43092: // blow kiss emote
startAnimation(0x558);
break;

now replace the

startAnimation(0x558);
break;

with this…

if (hitems == 1 && teleBlockTimer <= 0 && duelStatus != 3 && FinalFantasy != 1 && minigame1count <= 0 && Tz != 1 && inlifeBattle == false) { teleportToX = xxxx; teleportToY = yyyy; heightLevel = 0; } break; [/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change/edit these two things

item.dc:creator: @judgechaos judgechaos
item.description:
@judgechaos wrote:

woopee another kiddie coder…first of all open up ur client.java then search for sumthing like this

Blow", 11102); thats were u change the color and name here is my list from my server…

sendQuest("@gre@Safe, @red@Wild, @whi@Emote", 174); sendQuest("@gre@Drag", 180); sendQuest("@gre@Abby", 181); sendQuest("@gre@Barr", 178); sendQuest("@gre@Slayer", 175); sendQuest("@gre@PVP", 177); sendQuest("@gre@Shop", 182); sendQuest("@red@KBD", 185); sendQuest("@red@Chaos", 186); sendQuest("@gre@Jad", 173); sendQuest("@gre@JDem", 179); sendQuest("@gre@TS", 187); sendQuest("@gre@Gaurd", 176); sendQuest("@gre@BlueD", 13371); sendQuest("@gre@BM", 13372); sendQuest("@gre@Elf", 13373); sendQuest("@gre@Tz -", 13374); sendQuest("@gre@Haar", 13375); sendQuest("@gre@PGD", 13376); sendQuest("@gre@", 13377); sendQuest("@gre@Fish", 13378); sendQuest("@gre@", 13379); sendQuest("@gre@Dag", 13380); sendQuest("@red@Moss", 13381); sendQuest("@gre@KQ", 13382); sendQuest("@whi@Blow", 11102); sendQuest("@whi@Kiss", 11103); sendQuest("@whi@Glass", 6533); sendQuest("@whi@Box", 6532); sendQuest("@whi@Climb", 6540); sendQuest("@whi@Rope", 6541); sendQuest("@whi@Lean", 11101); sendQuest("@whi@Glass", 6519); sendQuest("@whi@Wall", 6522);

if u wanna change it to a tele search this…

case 43092: // blow kiss emote
startAnimation(0x558);
break;

now replace the

startAnimation(0x558);
break;

with this…

if (hitems == 1 && teleBlockTimer <= 0 && duelStatus != 3 && FinalFantasy != 1 && minigame1count <= 0 && Tz != 1 && inlifeBattle == false) { teleportToX = xxxx; teleportToY = yyyy; heightLevel = 0; } break;
